channel.title: FLF - God, Law, and Liberty
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: What Is a Cosmology Worldview vis-Ã -vis a Biblical Worldview? [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: Today David explains why he ended last week’s program saying he was “giving up” on a Biblical worldview if it was not set in the context of a Cosmological worldview. He speaks to what the former led to in his political thinking and lays the foundation for putting a Biblical worldview inside a Cosmological worldview for the sake of reshaping the way Christians engage in politics and law.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Power Politics and the Discipling of the Nations [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: Despite the Moral Majority, the Christian Coalition, and subsequent Christian policy and political organizations, Christian virtue in our society has waned. Some think that is a sign of the end times. David examines what this says about our knowledge of God and creation and offers a reason for hope found in the strangest of places.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
